remarks: Cancellation of a nonzero factor on the right in an equation.  One-way deduction form of ~ mulcan2d .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
mulcanad.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mulcanad.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mulcanad.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
mulcanad.4 $e |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) $.
mulcan2ad.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( A x. C ) = ( B x. C ) ) $.
mulcan2ad $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
